strength.title: HYPERD'S STRENGTHS
strength.description: From high-tech to services that require know-how, leave it to a team with development experience.
strength.description_1: We build a Web3 ecosystem with developers with blockchain technology and provide stable performance and security.

testimonial.title: REVIEW
testimonial.description_1: 팀 내부 개발자가 없고, 저도 개발을 몰라 걱정했지만 하이퍼디를 만나고 무사히 완료하고 출시했어요.
testimonial.description_2: “We were able to launch the platform from start to finish. Want to work with HyperD as a long-term partner.”
testimonial.description_3: “Blockchain development, HyperD created with trained developers.”
testimonial.title_4: Team I met around the clock
testimonial.description_4: “I was skeptical at first. I liked the solid verification and PM's management. Now I settled on HyperD.”

testimonial.description_5: 다른곳과 많이 실패 했습니다. 하이퍼 디에 정착했어요.
